```{r, message=FALSE}
# load required libraries
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

#color palette 
myColors <- c("black", '#56B4E9', "gray", "#E69F00")
names(myColors) <- c('consensus', 'discordant', 'none', 'novel')
colScale <- scale_colour_manual(name = "diag_group",values = myColors)

# filepaths
resfile <- "../input/extended_denovoWEST_results.tab"
dnmfile <- '../input/DDD_RUMC_GDX_denovos_2019_05_15__wweights.txt.gz'
id_sex_filepath <- '../input/fordist_joint_dnm_ID_sex_2019_08_22.txt'

# counts per study
Nddd <- 9858
Nnjm <- 2417
Ngdx <- 18783
N_all <- Nddd + Ngdx + Nnjm
```

#Figure 1(a)  

```{r, fig.align='center'}
#compare mupit to denovo WEST
th <- -log10(0.025)

res_mup <- fread(resfile,sep = "\t")
#ignore undiagnosed analysis here
res_mup <- res_mup[!is.na(res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full),]
res_mup$lg10denovoWEST <- -log10(res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full)
res_mup$mup_pval_bonf <- p.adjust(res_mup$mup_pval,method = "bonferroni",n=(18500*2))
res_mup$mup_pval_bonf[res_mup$mup_pval_bonf<10^(-16)] <- 10^(-16)
res_mup$lg10mup <- -log10(res_mup$mup_pval_bonf)

n_mupit <- sum(res_mup$mup_pval_bonf<=0.025 & res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full>0.025 & !is.na(res_mup$mup_pval_bonf) & !is.na(res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full))
n_new <- sum(res_mup$mup_pval_bonf>0.025 & res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full<=0.025 & !is.na(res_mup$mup_pval_bonf) & !is.na(res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full))
n_both <- sum(res_mup$mup_pval_bonf<=0.025 & res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full<=0.025 & !is.na(res_mup$mup_pval_bonf) & !is.na(res_mup$denovoWEST_p_full))

res_mup$nonsyn_count <- res_mup$lofcount + res_mup$missense_variant
#res_mup <- res_mup[!(res_mup$min_p == 1 & res_mup$mup_pval == 1),]
p <- ggplot(res_mup, aes(x = lg10mup,y = lg10denovoWEST, col = diag_group)) + 
        geom_point(data = res_mup[!(res_mup$diag_group == "consensus")],aes(x = lg10mup, y = lg10denovoWEST, size = nonsyn_count), alpha = 0.9) + 
        geom_point(data = res_mup[(res_mup$diag_group == "consensus")],aes(x = lg10mup, y = lg10denovoWEST, size = nonsyn_count), alpha = 0.55) +
        colScale+ geom_hline(yintercept = th, linetype = "dashed",color = "gray43") + 
        geom_vline(xintercept = th,linetype = "dashed",color = "gray43") +
        geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 1, color = "gray43",linetype = "dotted")  + 
        xlab("-log10(mupit p-value)") + ylab("-log10(DeNovo WEST p-value)")+theme_classic() + 
        theme(legend.position = "top",legend.text = element_text(size = 14),legend.title = element_blank(),axis.text=element_text(size=14),axis.title=element_text(size=16)) 
  
  p + annotate(geom = "text",x = 4.5, y = 13, label = toString(n_both),color = "gray43",size = 8) +
      annotate(geom = "text",x = 0.2, y = 13, label = toString(n_new),color = "gray43",size = 8) +
      annotate(geom = "text",x = 5, y = 0.5, label = toString(n_mupit),color = "gray43",size = 8)
```

#Figure 1(b)  

```{r, fig.align='center'}
# denovoWEST p-value bins
pval_2.5bins_gene_category_diagnostic_lists <- res_mup %>%
  filter(sig==TRUE) %>%
  mutate(pvalbin = case_when(denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-2 & denovoWEST_p >2.5e-4 ~ '2.5e-2 to 2.5e-4',
                             denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-4 & denovoWEST_p >2.5e-6 ~ '2.5e-4 to 2.5e-6',
                             denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-6 & denovoWEST_p >2.5e-8 ~ '2.5e-6 to 2.5e-8',
                             denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-8 & denovoWEST_p >2.5e-10 ~ '2.5e-8 to 2.5e-10',
                             denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-10 & denovoWEST_p >2.5e-12 ~ '2.5e-10 to 2.5e-12',
                             denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-12 & denovoWEST_p >2.5e-14 ~ '2.5e-12 to 2.5e-14',
                             denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-14 ~ '< 2.5e-14')) %>%
  mutate(pvalbin = ifelse(is.na(pvalbin), case_when(undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-2 & undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p >2.5e-4 ~ '2.5e-2 to 2.5e-4',
                             undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-4 & undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p >2.5e-6 ~ '2.5e-4 to 2.5e-6',
                             undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-6 & undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p >2.5e-8 ~ '2.5e-6 to 2.5e-8',
                             undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-8 & undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p >2.5e-10 ~ '2.5e-8 to 2.5e-10',
                             undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-10 & undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p >2.5e-12 ~ '2.5e-10 to 2.5e-12',
                             undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-12 & undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p >2.5e-14 ~ '2.5e-12 to 2.5e-14',
                             undiagnosed_denovoWEST_p < 2.5e-14 ~ '< 2.5e-14'), pvalbin)) %>%
  group_by(pvalbin, diag_group) %>%
  tally()

pval_2.5bins_gene_category_diagnostic_lists$pvalbin <- factor(pval_2.5bins_gene_category_diagnostic_lists$pvalbin, levels=c('2.5e-2 to 2.5e-4','2.5e-4 to 2.5e-6','2.5e-6 to 2.5e-8','2.5e-8 to 2.5e-10','2.5e-10 to 2.5e-12', '2.5e-12 to 2.5e-14', '< 2.5e-14'))
pval_2.5bins_gene_category_diagnostic_lists$diag_group <- factor(pval_2.5bins_gene_category_diagnostic_lists$diag_group, levels=c('novel', 'discordant', 'consensus'))

ggplot(pval_2.5bins_gene_category_diagnostic_lists, aes(x=pvalbin, y=n, fill=diag_group)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity') +
  theme_classic() +
  labs(x='p-value bin', y='Number of genes') +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#E69F00","#56B4E9","black")) +
  theme(axis.text.x  = element_text(size=14), axis.text.y = element_text(size=14), axis.title = element_text(size=16), legend.title = element_blank(), legend.text = element_text(size=14)) +
  scale_y_continuous('Number of genes',breaks=seq(0,125,25), labels=seq(0,125,25))
```

#Figure 1(d)  

```{r}
# load de novo mutations
all <- read.table(dnmfile, stringsAsFactors = F, sep = '\t', header = T)
all <- all %>% mutate(study3 = ifelse(study=='newGDX', 'GDX', study))

# determine fraction of cases with nonsynonymous DNM in each gene category
# all consensus known, significant discordant known, significant novel
nodoublecount_fractioncase <- all %>%
  filter((symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='consensus' | sig==TRUE)$symbol) & !(consequence %in% c('coding_sequence_variant', 'stop_retained_variant', 'synonymous_variant'))) %>%
  mutate(diag_list = case_when(symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='consensus')$symbol ~ 'consensus',
                             symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='discordant' & sig==TRUE)$symbol ~ 'discordant',
                             symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='novel')$symbol ~ 'novel')) %>%
  group_by(id, diag_list) %>%
  tally() %>%
  spread(diag_list, n) %>%
  replace(., is.na(.), 0) %>%
  mutate(person_cat = ifelse(consensus>0, 'consensus', ifelse(discordant>0, 'discordant', 'novel'))) %>%
  group_by(person_cat) %>%
  tally() %>%
  mutate(fractioncase_all = n/N_all)

nodoublecount_fractioncase
```

```{r, fig.align='center'}
# expected fraction of cases with a diagnostic coding de novo mutation -- estimated by Hilary Martin
fractioncase_all_dnv <- 0.486

# determining the remaining fraction of cases
nodoublecount_fractioncase <- add_row(nodoublecount_fractioncase,
                                        person_cat=c('remaining', 'not de novo'),
                                        n=c(NA, NA),
                                        fractioncase_all=c(fractioncase_all_dnv-sum(nodoublecount_fractioncase$fractioncase_all), 1-fractioncase_all_dnv))
nodoublecount_fractioncase$person_cat <- factor(nodoublecount_fractioncase$person_cat, levels = c('not de novo', 'remaining', 'novel', 'discordant', 'consensus'))

# plot the fraction of cases
ggplot(nodoublecount_fractioncase, aes(x=1, y=fractioncase_all, fill=person_cat))+
  geom_bar(stat='identity') +
  labs(y='Fraction of cases', x='', title='') +
  theme_classic() +
theme(legend.title = element_blank(), axis.text.x  = element_blank(), axis.text.y = element_text(size=14), axis.title = element_text(size=16), legend.text = element_text(size=14), axis.line.x = element_blank(), axis.ticks.x = element_blank(), axis.line.y = element_blank()) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = rev(c("black", '#56B4E9', "#E69F00", "#009E73", 'lightgray')))
```

#Figure 1(e)  

```{r, fig.align='center'}
# need to load sex metadata
id_sex <- read.table(id_sex_filepath, stringsAsFactors = F, sep = '\t', header = T)
female_ids <- subset(id_sex, sex=='F')$id
male_ids <- subset(id_sex, sex=='M')$id

N_female <- length(female_ids)
N_male <- length(male_ids)

# split fraction of cases by sex
nodoublecount_fractioncase_by_sex <- all %>%
  filter((symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='consensus' | sig==TRUE)$symbol) & !(consequence %in% c('coding_sequence_variant', 'stop_retained_variant', 'synonymous_variant'))) %>%
  mutate(diag_list = case_when(symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='consensus')$symbol ~ 'consensus',
                             symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='discordant' & sig==TRUE)$symbol ~ 'discordant',
                             symbol %in% subset(res_mup, diag_group=='novel')$symbol ~ 'novel')) %>%
  mutate(sex = case_when(id %in% female_ids ~ 'female',
                         id %in% male_ids ~ 'male')) %>%
  group_by(id, sex, diag_list) %>%
  tally() %>%
  spread(diag_list, n) %>%
  replace(., is.na(.), 0) %>%
  mutate(person_cat = ifelse(consensus>0, 'consensus', ifelse(discordant>0, 'discordant', 'novel'))) %>%
  group_by(person_cat, sex) %>%
  tally() %>%
  mutate(fractioncase = case_when(sex=='female' ~ n/N_female,
                                  sex=='male' ~ n/N_male))

nodoublecount_fractioncase_by_sex$person_cat <- factor(nodoublecount_fractioncase_by_sex$person_cat, levels = c('novel', 'discordant', 'consensus'))

ggplot(nodoublecount_fractioncase_by_sex, aes(x=sex, y=fractioncase, fill=person_cat))+
  geom_bar(stat='identity') +
  labs(y='Fraction of cases', x='', title='') +
  theme_classic() +
  ylim(c(0,0.3)) +
theme(legend.title = element_blank(), axis.text.x  = element_text(size = 14), axis.text.y = element_text(size=14), axis.title = element_text(size=16), legend.text = element_text(size=14), axis.line.x = element_blank(), axis.ticks.x = element_blank(), axis.line.y = element_blank()) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = rev(c("black", '#56B4E9', "#E69F00")))
```
